description:
This 300+ lesson course includes video and text explanations of everything in calculus 2, and more than 100 quizzes (with solutions!) to help you test your understanding along the way. Become a Calculus 2 Master is organized into four sections: Integrals, Applications of Integrals, Polar & Parametric, and Sequences & Series. These are four of the most common chapters in every calculus 2 class.

This course is perfect for anyone currently enrolled in a calculus 2 class, anyone planning to take it in the near future, or anyone who's interested in learning intermediate-level calculus.
title: Become a Calculus 2 Master
